label: Cosmopolitan
description: Indulge in the exquisite taste of the Cosmopolitan, a sophisticated blend of vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and a splash of lime. This iconic cocktail is known for its vibrant pink hue and refreshing citrus notes that dance on your palate.

label: Whisky Sour
description: Experience the timeless allure of the Whisky Sour, a classic cocktail that perfectly balances the bold flavors of whiskey with the sweetness of simple syrup and the zing of fresh lemon juice. Served over ice, it's a harmonious symphony of taste sensations.

label: A’la French
description: Transport yourself to the streets of Paris with the A’la French cocktail. This delightful concoction combines French brandy, elderflower liqueur, and a hint of citrus. Sip and savor the elegance of this drink inspired by the City of Lights.

label: Cuba Libre pl
description: Embark on a journey to the vibrant streets of Havana with the Cuba Libre pl. This Cuban-inspired cocktail features a perfect blend of dark rum, cola, and a splash of fresh lime juice. Immerse yourself in the tropical vibes with every sip.

label: Whisky z Colą
description: Bold and invigorating, the Whisky z Colą combines the robust notes of whisky with the effervescence of cola. This classic duo is elevated with a modern twist, creating a drink that's both timeless and contemporary.

label: Sex on the Beach
description: Escape to a tropical paradise with the Sex on the Beach cocktail. A delightful medley of vodka, peach schnapps, cranberry juice, and orange juice, this fruity concoction captures the essence of sun, sand, and sea breeze.

label: Gimlet
description: Savor the crisp and refreshing taste of the Gimlet. This classic cocktail features the perfect balance of gin and lime juice, creating a zesty and invigorating drink that's a true testament to timeless mixology.

label: A’la Mimoza
description: Celebrate elegance with the A’la Mimoza cocktail. This effervescent blend of champagne and fresh orange juice is a tribute to the classic Mimosa, delivering a burst of citrusy delight with every sip.

label: Wódka z Colą
description: Embrace the bold flavors of Wódka z Colą, a fusion of vodka and cola that awakens your taste buds. This no-nonsense cocktail is a go-to choice for those who appreciate the classic combination of spirits and soda.

label: Gin z Colą
description: Elevate your evening with the Gin z Colą, a delightful blend of gin and cola that marries the botanical richness of gin with the effervescence of cola. It's a simple yet sophisticated choice for any occasion.

label: Puke
description: Dare to be bold with the Puke cocktail. This unconventional mix of spirits packs a punch, combining unexpected flavors for a daring drinking experience. Not for the faint of heart, Puke is a fearless exploration of taste.

label: Strong Whisky Sour
description: For those seeking an extra kick, indulge in the Strong Whisky Sour. This robust variation of the classic cocktail boasts a higher concentration of whiskey, creating a bold and intense flavor profile that demands attention.

label: Crunbergin
description: Immerse yourself in the unique taste of Crunbergin, a distinctive blend of gin and cranberry. This unconventional cocktail offers a harmonious balance of botanicals and tartness, making it a memorable choice for adventurous palates.

label: Gin & Tonic
description: Elevate your spirits with the timeless Gin & Tonic. This classic highball cocktail features the crispness of gin and the effervescence of tonic water, garnished with a twist of lime. It's a refreshing and iconic choice for any occasion.

label: Whisky & Tonic
description: Experience the bold fusion of Whisky & Tonic, a contemporary take on the classic highball. This drink combines the rich, smoky notes of whisky with the crisp and bubbly essence of tonic water, creating a sophisticated libation.

label: Room 187 (Host's Special)
description: Step into the exclusive realm of Room 187 with the Host's Special cocktail. Crafted with secret ingredients and unparalleled finesse, this bespoke drink is a testament to the host's mastery in mixology. Indulge in a taste experience like no other.
